tool_description: AI-powered Anti-Spam & Content Moderation API to secure & streamline communication.
name: SpamSpy
title: SpamSpy

api_list.name: Auth Check
api_list.description: Checks if the API Key is still valid, useful for troubleshooting issues with API implementation.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://spamspy.p.rapidapi.com/AuthCheck"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "spamspy.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Comprehend
api_list.description:
> **Model Service Status: *Full Model Retraining In Progress***
**Mock Responses: Enabled (Service Mode)**

**Comprehend Is Currently in Model Lifecycle Stage 1 - Submit All Content To `{Learn}` for ~2-6 Days Before Activating For Most Stable Results!**
Comprehend uses the current AI public modals and submits the content (located in the query string) to be identified as spam or not.
- Fetch Method Get
- Returns Boolean: **true** / **false**
Example Response:
`{"SpamSpyResult":true}` (content is spam)
`{"SpamSpyResult":false}`(content is not spam)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://spamspy.p.rapidapi.com/Comprehend"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "spamspy.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Remember
api_list.description:
Functions as a free & nearunlimited version of the classic reactive spam filtering approach.  Recommended to be used to cut down on "Comprehend" endpoint call usage if the content has a match, there is no need to have SpamSpy recalculate responses it has already reviewed. 
This endpoint checks the existing spam database for queried content and sends back the latest scanned result if the content exists yet.

Example Responses:
`{"SpamSpyResult":true}` (content is spam)
`{"SpamSpyResult":false}`(content is not spam)
`{"SpamSpyResult":"Content not yet scanned"}` (content has **NOT YET** been scanned)
api_list.code:

url = "https://spamspy.p.rapidapi.com/Remember"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "spamspy.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
